title: Sir Failure
description: A very intense song which talks about the two in you, and we are sure that when the day will come, you will dive with us into the red light distortion
lyrics_en: I know you've always been with me,
And you aim to burry me
Now it's the time to tell you
To the one I never knew
and in this maze, find your way
When we'll be close to the last ultimate day
How will we face our brain ?
The day when all was burning
He pushed the doors of my mind
And since that time, made me blind

title: Expload
description: A very intense song which talks about the two in you, and we are sure that when the day will come, you will dive with us into the red light distortion

You're just finding a way to gain..

The threat you feared is very real,

title: The Death's Coffin
description:
Will you board into the Death's coffin ?
When you'll look downward and see the sky, you know it's too late to escape !

Spin, it's the time to spin babe,
